short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that searches for job opening terms on a webpage and highlights them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lion Federal Resume Matcher: An Internal Tool for Lion Federal

Streamline your recruitment process with Lion Federal's exclusive Chrome extension, designed specifically for internal use within the organization. Utilizing OpenAI's API, this tool compares resumes with job postings, ensuring a perfect match between candidate qualifications and job requirements.

Features:

Resume Comparison:

Analyze resumes against job postings.
Identify the best matches using OpenAI.
Contact Integration (Coming Soon):

Extract contact info from resumes.
Connect via tel, SMS, or mailto links.
Prewritten, customizable messages.
Exclusively for Lion Federal:

Tailored to meet the unique needs of Lion Federal's recruitment team.
Ensures a seamless and secure experience within the organization.
Save time and enhance efficiency with this must-have internal tool for Lion Federal's hiring professionals. Stay tuned for exciting updates!

Note: This extension is exclusively for internal use at Lion Federal and is not available to the general public.
